### Seamless Installation

Get started in minutes with our user-friendly CLI. Here's how:

<Steps>

<Step>Launch the CLI and initiate the template installation with a single command:</Step>

```bash
npx nyxbui@latest template
```

<Step>Follow the intuitive prompts:</Step>
   - Choose the cutting-edge `startup` template.
   - Specify your project's directory name.
   - Select your preferred package manager (npm, pnpm, yarn, or bun).

<Step>Sit back as the CLI works its magic, downloading the template, installing dependencies, and optionally setting up a git repository.</Step>

<Step>Navigate to your new project and launch the development server:</Step>

```bash-session
cd <your-project-directory>
<package-manager> run dev
```
</Steps>
